Class: ForwardMessage

ForwardMessage

A message which contains a forwarded message

Constructor

new ForwardMessage(message, API)

Creates a new ForwardMessage object
Parameters:
Name Type Description
message Object A raw message object from an update
API BotAPI An instance of a BotAPI from teleapiwrapper which will be used to do stuff with this message

  • message_classes/forward_message.js, line 18

Extends

  • TextMessage

Members

originalDate

The timestamp of the original message, not this one
Source:
  • message_classes/forward_message.js, line 42

originalSender

The original sender of the message, not the one who forwarded it

  • message_classes/forward_message.js, line 35

text

The text of the message
